snippet: Beginning early next month, the New York artist Jonathan Horowitz will exhibit "Your Land/My Land: Election '12" -- an installation designed to promote engagement with the issues raised by the coming election.
abstract: Beginning early next month, the New York artist Jonathan Horowitz will exhibit "Your Land/My Land: Election '12" -- an installation designed to promote engagement with the issues raised by the coming election.

headline.main: Making Art Out of November's Election
headline.print_headline: Making Art Out of Presidential Politics
